casebody.data:
The Fidelity Bank
v.
N.C. Department of Revenue 392A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 17, 2017 Donalt J. Eglinton, Attorney at Law, New Bern, Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, Amy P. Wang, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for The Fidelity Bank. Perry J. Pelaez, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Revenue.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of February 2017 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of February 2017."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 5th day of April 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
